item.title: W4-S1 Transcendental Functions
item.description: 周次: 4 日期: March 16, 2022 节次: 1 In this and next lectures, we will quickly go through the contents in chapter 7. Since a lot of the contents have been taught last semester or have known in high school age. § 7.1 Inverse Functions and Their Derivatives We have learned inverse functions, their domain and range, their graph, etc. In particular, we have
